channel.title: AuthorAlly
channel.description: Join us as we dive into the world of writing, publishing, and everything in between. Whether you're an aspiring author, a seasoned writer, or just a book lover, this podcast is your go-to resource for insightful interviews, expert advice, and inspiring stories from the literary community.
channel.itunes:summary: Host Jon Writer delves deep into the creative minds of authors and their captivating books, bringing you in-depth and thought-provoking conversations and analyses.
channel.itunes:author: Jon Writer

item.title: Episode 3 feat. Amanda Sundberg Halvorson
item.description: 🎙️In this episode of AuthorAlly, we sit down with Amanda Sundberg Halvorson, the inspiring author of "Love and Leukemia: The Inspiring True Story of Lars Sundberg". ❤️📚 Amanda shares the heartfelt journey of writing her book, which chronicles her and Lars' deeply moving love story and their resilience in the face of Lars' leukemia diagnosis. 💪💞 Together, we discuss the book's powerful message, the challenges and joys of its creation, and the publishing journey. ✍️✨ Tune in for an intimate conversation about love, hope, and the strength of community in overcoming life's most daunting trials. 🌟🤝🎙️
item.itunes:summary: In this episode of AuthorAlly, Amanda Sundberg Halvorson, author of Love and Leukemia: The Inspiring True Story of Lars Sundberg, shares the profound love story she and Lars lived, the challenges they faced during his leukemia diagnosis, and the powerful journey of writing, publishing, and spreading a message of hope and resilience.

item.title: Episode 2 feat. James W. Cutter
item.description: 🎙️Join us for an exhilarating dive into the captivating world of "Hull and Fire"- a Flintlock-Fantasy! In this episode, we sit down with debut author James W. Cutter as he delves into the world of his thrilling first book.🌟During this exclusive interview, James W. Cutter shares the heart and soul of his story, from the inception of his characters to his strong aversion to the publishing process. Whether you’re a fan of adventure or political intrigue, this episode promises insights and revelations that will leave you on the edge of your seat and ready to begin reading!
item.itunes:summary: 🎙️In this episode, debut author James W. Cutter delves into his Flintlock-Fantasy "Hull and Fire," sharing insights on his characters and aversion to the publishing process.

item.title: Episode 1 feat. Alex Williams
item.description: 🎙️Dive deep with us as host Jon Writer chats with the incredible Alex Williams, the mastermind behind "For Love and Affection." 🌸 Get the inside scoop on the inspirations, challenges, and triumphs that shaped this heartfelt book. 📚✨ From late-night writing sessions to navigating the publishing world, Alex shares it all! Don't miss out—hit play now and be inspired! ❤️
item.itunes:summary: Author Alex Williams, of "For Love and Affection", drops in to talk about her book.
